scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend & npm run start:all" "cd frontend & npm run build & cd frontend & npm start"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd backend & npm run start:all:dev" "cd frontend & npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd backend & npm i & cd frontend & npm i & npm run migration:run
scripts.uninstall: npm run migration:down & cd backend & npm uninstall --no-save & cd frontend & npm uninstall --no-save
